MAN.TITLE: standard_output
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: get Scicos block output port positions

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : vector of x coordinates of the block regular and event output ports
: vector of y coordinates of the block regular and event output ports
: vector of output ports types (+1 : regular port; -1:event port)

DESCRIPTION.P: standard_output is the Scilab function used to get standard blocks output port position and types in interfacing functions.
Port positions are computed, each time they are required, as a function of block dimensions.
